message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair and reasonable start!
You got greedy on the first round, now it's my turn to take a bigger cut!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! Let's split it 55-45
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not impressed. Time to make a strong move!
Time to make a bold move! I'll take 70% and leave you with 30%
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not afraid. This is my last chance to take control!
You're going all-in, Bob? I'll match you with a 90-10 split!
